title: Hotel's best deal around the glove
text:
Home » travel » Hotel's best deal around the glove GETAWAYS Hotel's best deal around the glove The Nation   
Golden Tulip Sovereign Hotel Bangkok 
U Sathorn Bangkok 
Chaweng Regent Beach Resort Koh Samui 
Pakasai in Krabi BANGKOK City comforts Treat yourself during your next visit to Bangkok with Golden Tulip Sovereign Hotel Bangkok great value MRT Package. Relax and make yourself at home in a superior or deluxe room with breathtaking views of the city. Rates start from Bt2,300 to Bt2,900 depending on room types and number of occupants. The package includes daily buffet breakfast, welcome drink and fresh fruit upon arrival, express check in and check out at the Executive Lounge, complimentary hotel shuttle service, in-room coffee and tea, Fitness Centre and swimming pool access and late check-out until 4pm.The deal is good until December 31. Call (02) 614 4777 extension 8711-2 or e-mail: rsvn@gtsbkk.com. Just for U U Sathorn Bangkok is located in a peaceful part of the capital where natural beauty sits alongside the hustle and bustle of this busy Bangkok district. The hotel is now offering Ur Massage Package, which includes one aromatherapy massage (60 minutes) for two persons per stay, breakfast whenever and wherever, welcome drink from the minibar, U Choose your amenities service and free Wi-Fi. Rates range from Bt3,424 to Bt5,590 depending on room types. Book online at www.UHotelsResorts.com. Bed with a great breakfast Enjoy a special room rate and buffet breakfast at The Ambassador Hotel Bangkok with the Bed & Breakfast package starting at Bt2,040 per night for single or twin occupancy. The offer includes daily buffet breakfast at Am Cafe restaurant, coffee and tea set in-room, free access to gym facilities and Wi-Fi. The deal is good until December 31. Call (02) 254 0444 extension 1220 or e-mail: rdmbkk@amtel.co.th. SAMUT SAKHON Chilling with the fireflies Asita Eco Resort Amphawa offers the ideal opportunity to look after your body and mind with the weekday package "Go Clean…Go Green" at Bt3,500. The rate covers one night in a Superior Room from Sunday to Thursday inclusive of three organic meals for two persons. Taste freshly caught seafood from the resort's marine farm with organic vegetables and eggs from the resort's own garden. A half-day sightseeing tour by tuk tuk or night boat tour to see fireflies is available for an additional Bt300 fee per room. The offer is valid until the end of September. Call (081) 999 1692, (081) 999 4641 and (034) 767 333. E-mail: booking@asitaresort.com. Visit www.AsitaResort.com. KOH SAMUI Tropical treat Immerse yourself in a restful haven where white sand beaches meet the clear azure water at Chaweng Regent Beach Resort Koh Samui . The resort is now offering a two-night spa package for two persons starting at Bt12,600. It includes daily American breakfast, round-trip transfer between Samui Airport and hotel, welcome drink and fruit basket upon arrival and one spa treatment. The offer is available until December 31. Call (077) 300 500 or e-mail: usmrsvn@chawengregent.com. KRABI Feels like green spirit Get in touch with your green spirit at Pakasai in Krabi. The Green Traveller package includes two nights stay in a Deluxe Green Chalet with daily breakfast, a half-day canoe trip to the Tha-Lane grotto with a picnic and planting a tree at a school in Ao Nang. The deal costs Bt7,100 for two and is valid through October 15. E-mail: rest@pakasai.com and quote "Green Traveller". Visit www.Pakasai.com. 113 Viewed
